text: Norm Drucker (July 4, 1920 â€“ February 6, 2015) was an American basketball referee. His NBA and ABA career as both a referee and Supervisor of Officials lasted for 35 years. He was born in New York City, New York. Drucker died in East Norriton, Pennsylvania, aged 94. Category:1290 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Sportspeople from New York City
title: Norm Drucker
